Fabrizio Sandri

Computer Science student - University of Trento | Open source developer

I am a Student at the University of Trento currently undertaking my masterâ€™s degree in Computer Science with a specialization in Data Science. I received my B.Sc. at University of Trento in 2022, where I was advised by Alberto Montresor for my thesis project on Stellar as an alternative to the Bitcoin Proof-of-Work consensus protocols.

During my time at the University of Trento, I actively contributed to many open source projects including the NASA FPrime framework - a flight software and embedded systems framework - and the Data & Analytics Framework for the Italian Developers community - a community of developers who code and design Italian digital public services.

Currently I am participating in Google Summer of Code 2022 as a software developer for the R project for statistical computing to integrate the RcppDeepState library with GitHub Actions - RcppDeepState-action.
